text: Ratikant Satpathy (born 27 October 1970) is an Indian Odia-language playback singer and music director. Born in Cuttack, Odisha, he began his career as a playback singer and then started composing and directing songs for Odia cinema. He was a winner of Odisha State Film Awards for best male playback singer in 2008 for Odia film Bhagya Chakra, and in 2014 for the movie Rumku Jhumana. Satpathy was the assistant vice-president and then vice president at Odisha TV. == References == Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Indian male singer-songwriters Category:People from Cuttack district Category:People from Odisha Category:Singers from Odisha
title: Ratikant Satpathy
